name: storageify
author: Daniel Lopes <lopsch@googlemail.com>
description: Store/read Cycle.js state (from Cycle.js onionify) in/from HTML5 Local Storage

scripts.test-ci: rm -rf istanbul mochawesome && nyc mocha --colors --require babel-register --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=index,reportDir=mochawesome,quiet=false,enableCode=false
scripts.dist-ci: rm -rf dist && export BABEL_ENV=ci && babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps
scripts.dist-ci-min: rm -rf dist && export BABEL_ENV=ci-min && babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps
scripts.lint-dist: npm run lint && npm run dist-ci
scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run dist-ci && npm run test-ci && npm run coverage && npm run doc && npm run lib
scripts.format: prettier --write --print-width 80 --tab-width 2 --no-semi --single-quote --trailing-comma none --jsx-bracket-same-line --parser babylon src/**/*.js test/**/*.js && eslint --fix src/**/*.js test/**/*.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist istanbul jsdoc lib mochawesome
